Post.title: hexo
Post._content:
# 

+ nodejs[](https://nodejs.org/en/) 

```js
$ npm install hexo-cli -g
$ hexo init blog
$ cd blog
$ npm install
$ hexo server
```
<!-- more -->
# 
```
hexo n "" == hexo new "" #
hexo p == hexo publish
hexo g == hexo generate#
hexo s == hexo server #
hexo d == hexo deploy#
```
Post.raw:

+ nodejs[](https://nodejs.org/en/) 

```js
$ npm install hexo-cli -g
$ hexo init blog
$ cd blog
$ npm install
$ hexo server
```
<!-- more -->

```
hexo n "" == hexo new "" #
hexo p == hexo publish
hexo g == hexo generate#
hexo s == hexo server #
hexo d == hexo deploy#
```

Post.title: npm
Post._content:
# npm
  npmNode Package Managernode.jsnpmnpm
## npm
----
### npm
+ http://npm.taobao.org/
+ registryhttp://registry.npm.taobao.org/
### cnpmjs
+ http://cnpmjs.org/
+ registryhttp://r.cnpmjs.org/
## 
 npmregistrynpm
### 
 ```node
 npm --registry https://registry.npm.taobao.org install express
 ```
### 
```node
npm config set registry https://registry.npm.taobao.org

// 
npm config get registry
// 
npm info express
```
### cnpm
```node
npm install -g cnpm --registry=https://registry.npm.taobao.org

// 
cnpm install express
```
Post.raw:
---
title: npm
date: 2017-02-07 12:59:53
tags:

# npm
  npmNode Package Managernode.jsnpmnpm
## npm
----
### npm
+ http://npm.taobao.org/
+ registryhttp://registry.npm.taobao.org/
### cnpmjs
+ http://cnpmjs.org/
+ registryhttp://r.cnpmjs.org/
## 
 npmregistrynpm
### 
 ```node
 npm --registry https://registry.npm.taobao.org install express
 ```
### 
```node
npm config set registry https://registry.npm.taobao.org

// 
npm config get registry
// 
npm info express
```
### cnpm
```node
npm install -g cnpm --registry=https://registry.npm.taobao.org

// 
cnpm install express
```

Post.title: SVN
Post._content:
```bat
@echo off
SET SVN_LOOK="C:\Program Files (x86)\VisualSVN Server\bin\svnlook.exe"
SET SVN_STYLECOP=C:\SVNStyleCop\SVNStyleCop.exe

SET REV_OR_TRAN=transaction

IF "%3" == "test" SET REV_OR_TRAN=revision

%SVN_STYLECOP% -repository:%1 -%REV_OR_TRAN%:%2
IF %ERRORLEVEL% EQU 0 GOTO STYLECOP_OK
EXIT %ERRORLEVEL%

:STYLECOP_OK
%SVN_LOOK% log --%REV_OR_TRAN% %2 %1 | FindStr .
IF %ERRORLEVEL% EQU 0 GOTO FINAL_OK
ECHO "" >&2
EXIT -1

:FINAL_OK
EXIT 0

:FINAL_OK
EXIT 0
```
<!-- more -->

---

```

.loadby sos clr .Net 4.0
.loadc:\windows\microsoft.net\framework\v2.0.50727\sos.dll

.Netmscordacwks.dll.sympath=
``` 
<!--more-->
##  
```
!help    sos
!threads  
!threadpool(!tp)   
~54s   54
kb   callstack
~*e !clrstack  
!dumpheap  
!clrstack  
!dumpstackobjects threadstackobject
!dumpclass  
!eeheap   managedheap
!dumpobj(!do)  
!dumparray 
!syncblk   
!runaway  cpu
!gcroot    
!gchandles   GCHandle
!objsize    object
!pe    
vertarget  
```
 
## 
```

!dumpheap mt 
!do   
!da   
!gcroot  root
 

!dumpheap mt 79124418  79124418
!do 0aca1000  0aca1000
!gcroot 0aca1000  root 0aca1000
```

~*e!clrstack

## DUMP
``` 

 
Set objShell =CreateObject("Wscript.Shell")
Dim InputPid
InputPid = InputBox("Pid")
objCommand1 = """D:\ProgramFiles\Debugging Tools for Windows (x86)\adplus.vbs""" &" -hang -o d:\dump -quiet -p " & InputPid
objShell.Run(objCommand1)
 
.vbs
PID
```
